Song.title: Come And Listen
Song.copyright: David Crowder Â© 2005 sixsteps Music (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing) worshiptogether.com songs (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [F2(no3)] Come and [Bb2(no3)] listen [F2/A] Come to the w[Dm]ater's e[C]dge Al[Bb2(no3)]l you who [F2/A]know and fear the [Bb2]Lord [F2(no3)] Come and [Bb2(no3)] listen [F2/A] Come to the w[Dm]ater's e[C]dge Al[Bb2(no3)]l [F2/A] you who are thirsty [Bb2]come
Pre-Chorus: [C] Let me [F2]tell you what He [F2/A] has [Bb2]done for me [C] Let me [F2]tell you what He [F2/A] has [Bb2]done for me [F2/A] He has [Bb2]done for you [F2/A] He has [Bb2]done for us
Chorus 1: [F] Come and li[Bb2]sten [Csus] [F/A] Come and li[Dm]sten to [Csus]what He's done [F] Come and li[Bb2]sten [Csus] [F/A] Come and li[Dm]sten to [Csus]what He's d[F]one
Inst: [| F | Bb2 | F2/A | Dm Csus | Bb2 | F2/A | Bb2 | |]
Bridge: P[C]raise [F2] our [F2/A] God for [Bb2]He is good P[C]raise [F2] our [F2/A] God for [Bb2]He is good P[C]raise [F2] our [F2/A] God for [Bb2]He is good P[C]raise [F2] our [F2/A] God for [Bb2]He is good [F2/A] He has [Bb2]done for me [F2/A] He has [Bb2]done for you [F2/A] He has [Bb2]done for us
Inst: [| F | Bb2 | F2/A | Dm Csus | Bb2 | F/Bb | Bb2 | F2(no3) |]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 come and listen come to the waters edge all you who know and fear the lord come and listen come to the waters edge all you who are thirsty come prechorus let me tell you what he has done for me let me tell you what he has done for me he has done for you he has done for us chorus 1 come and listen come and listen to what hes done come and listen come and listen to what hes done inst bridge praise our god for he is good praise our god for he is good praise our god for he is good praise our god for he is good he has done for me he has done for you he has done for us inst
